author: Bloomberg
title: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway joins global debt splurge
description: Buffett said last month the effects of the virus and an oil shock were “a big one-two punch.”
content:
By Finbarr Flynn and Issei HazamaBerkshire Hathaway Inc. priced yen-denominated bonds on Thursday, joining a global surge in debt issuance during the past month by companies facing a worldwide recession.
